name: Haspa & Co
description:
The code in here applies to several German 'Sparkassen' (kind of bank).
    
        I wrote it to defend my eyes against that psychedelic red they're using.   
    
        Donated to the public domain. Use solely at your own risk.
        May it contribute to your eye's health.  :)
additional_info:
At the time of this writing (2021-05-05) I have only tested it with 

            - Haspa.de (Short for 'Hamburger Sparkasse')
            - spk-westholstein.de (Short for 'Sparkasse Westholstein')

        If you're a user of a German Sparkasse, try this out and see if it works.
        The odds are good. :)
